sentences.en: Embezzlement is embezzlement if the politicians want to have It'so.
sentences.cn: 倘使政客们要这么办,侵吞公款就是侵吞公款.

sentences.en: Embezzlement of public funds and is a serious economic crime.
sentences.cn: 挪用公款罪是一项严重的经济犯罪.

sentences.en: He did six years for embezzlement.
sentences.cn: 因为偷盗他服刑六个月.

sentences.en: He has been removed from office and prosecuted on a charge of embezzlement.
sentences.cn: 他营私舞弊,已经被撤职查办.

sentences.en: He juggled the figures to hide his embezzlement.
sentences.cn: 他为了隐瞒挪用公款一事而在数字上做了手脚.

sentences.en: He turns thumbs down on things like embezzlement and tax evasion.
sentences.cn: 他反对像挪用公款和逃税的事情.

sentences.en: He was found guilty of embezzlement.
He was later charged with embezzlement.
sentences.cn: 他后来被指控挪用公款。
他被指控犯罪侵占信托财产.

sentences.en: He was sent to prison for six months for embezzlement.
sentences.cn: 他因侵占资产被监六个月.

sentences.en: How could embezzlement be prevented and punished?
sentences.cn: 如何阻止和惩罚挪用公款的行为?

sentences.en: She was charged with being an accessory to the embezzlement of funds.
sentences.cn: 她被指控为这起挪用公款案的从犯。

sentences.en: The crisis for him came on the day when Frank was arrested on the embezzlement charge.
sentences.cn: 当法兰克以挪用公款罪被捕的一天,他也遭到了厄运.

sentences.en: The High Court convicted him of embezzlement of public funds.
sentences.cn: 高等法院判他盗用公款罪成.

sentences.en: The judge sent him to prison for embezzlement of funds.
sentences.cn: 法官因他盗用公款将其送入监牢。

sentences.en: When he was dismissed for embezzlement he did not find it easy to get another job.
sentences.cn: 当他因为挪用代为保管的财物而被开除的时候,他发现很难再找到工作.

words.tran_cn: 侵占公款犯，盗用公款者

trans.tran_cn: 盗用，挪用，贪污，侵吞公款，侵占
trans.tran_en: Embezzlement is the crime of embezzling money
